Exercises-code_output_Question5_key1: Given a string, write a program to check if it is palindrome or not.
Exercises-code_output_Question5_key2: A string is said to be palindrome if the reverse of the string is the same as the string.
Exercises-code_output_Question5_key4: “RADAR” is a palindrome, but “RADIX” is not a palindrome
